content: **summary** first of three snowflakes in the crochet a snowflake gift topper article this is the only one with a photo in the article the other two snowflakes are open chain loop snowflake 1 and star snowflake 2 you will also need a yarn needle and fabric stiffener link http //web archive org/web/20171228075734/http //www bhg com/christmas/cards/crochet-a-snowflake-gift-topper/ 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/open-chain-loop-snowflake 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/star-snowflake
